content: make a cute cover-up for your next beach day i used 4 skeins of 24/7 cotton and a k hook for a nice drapey cover-up constructed in row to create a triangle you can easily make it larger or smaller by adjusting the number of repeats this pattern has been tested for accuracy but please contact me at craftsbysarahliz@gmail com if you encounter any issues i would love to see your work tag me on instagram @craftsbysarahliz so i can see your work thank you for your interest in my pattern your support of my small business is truly appreciated permissions you are free to sell what you make from this pattern i would appreciate links back to my blog ravelry or etsy shop to credit me as the designer you may not use my photos you may not sell this pattern or any part of this pattern distribute it or claim it as your own © 2023 sarah gross - crafts by sarah liz
